Class TypyWycieczekService

java.lang.Object
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.AbstractServices<TypyWycieczek,String>
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.TypyWycieczekService
@Service public class TypyWycieczekService extends AbstractServices<TypyWycieczek,String>
The TypyWycieczekService class provides service operations for managing trip types (represented by the TypyWycieczek entity) in the application.

This service extends AbstractServices to inherit common CRUD operations. It implements domain-specific validation when adding new trip types, such as ensuring that the trip type is unique and that its code length is either 2 or 3 characters. In addition, it provides a method to retrieve the list of city assignments (represented by MiastaWycieczek) for a given trip type.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public TypyWycieczek add(TypyWycieczek typy_wycieczek)
      Adds a new trip type to the database after performing necessary validations.

      This method checks if a trip type with the same code already exists by using TypyWycieczekRepository.existsByTyp(String). If a duplicate is found, it throws a DuplicatedEntityExceptionn. Additionally, it validates that the trip type code, after trimming, has a length of either 2 or 3 characters; if not, a WrongCodeLengthException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      add in class AbstractServices<TypyWycieczek,String>
      Parameters:
      typy_wycieczek - the TypyWycieczek entity to be added
      Returns:
      the saved TypyWycieczek entity
      Throws:
      DuplicatedEntityExceptionn - if a trip type with the same code already exists
      WrongCodeLengthException - if the trip type code is not 2 or 3 characters long

    • getMiastaWycieczki

      public List<MiastaWycieczek> getMiastaWycieczki(TypyWycieczek typWycieczki)
      Retrieves the list of city assignments for a given trip type.

      This method uses a custom query defined in TypyWycieczekRepository to fetch all MiastaWycieczek records associated with the specified trip type.

      Parameters:
      typWycieczki - the TypyWycieczek entity for which to retrieve city assignments
      Returns:
      a List of MiastaWycieczek entities corresponding to the specified trip type
